constantValues: Important observation on the state of a given vehicle or device, typically resulting from an inspection.

definitions.description: Important observation on the state of a given vehicle or device, typically resulting from an inspection.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deviceId

constantValues: Vehicle or device for which the observation applies.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Vehicle or device for which the observation applies.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deviceInspectionId

constantValues: Parent inspection record for the observation.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Parent inspection record for the observation.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deviceObservationTypeId

constantValues: The observation documented for this vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The observation documented for this vehicle or device.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: serviceAppointmentId

constantValues: Parent service appointment booked when this observation was documented.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Parent service appointment booked when this observation was documented.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: serviceOrderId

constantValues: Parent service order being worked when this observation was documented.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Parent service order being worked when this observation was documented.
